mean_en: the soft fine hair that covers the body of sheep, goats and some other animals; long thick thread made from animal’s wool, used for knitting; cloth made from animal’s wool, used for making clothes, etc.
sentence: Lend me your wool please. I'll make you a pretty sweater.
sentence_trans: 借我点儿你的羊毛，我要给你织一件漂亮的毛衣。
